title: (x) sans italic "Rent a car" - News Gothic {Thierry}
content:

comments.content:
it looks alot like [news gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20121127194441/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-gothic/), but one version is not bold enough, and the one that is bold enough has an R that has a rounded "second stem"..

well, doesnt help much, right? sorry.
It can be very difficult to ID sans caps when so few are provided. Do you have more samples?
